column8: In Brazil, we also receive practical training during undergrad. Hence, I practiced (e.g., externship and internship), under supervision, in the following areas: (1) Clinical Therapy (600+ hrs); (2) Psychological assessment (250+ hrs); (3) Neuropsychological assessment (250+ hrs); (4) Health Psychology in the department of neurosurgery of a public hospital (150+). Across all these areas, I've worked with 60+ patients.
